did.unittitle: Catalogs of Michigan-based automobile companies 1896-1971 undated
did.abstract: Trade catalogs, brochures and other promotional material produced by Michigan automobile manufacturers, primarily 1905-1935.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The collections was assembled from a variety of sources.

accruals.p: Periodic additions to the collection are expected.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright status of individual items varies.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Catalogs of Michigan-based automobile companies, 1896-1971 and undated, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: The Bentley Historical Library as a repository of Michigan-based materials has accumulated from different sources a collection of automobile catalogs. These catalogs are an important source for the study of the development of the automobile industry in Michigan.

scopecontent.p: The collection consists of trade catalogs, brochures and other promotional material produced by Michigan automobile manufacturers, primarily 1905-1935.The collection has been arranged alphabetically by name of automobile company. A few catalogs from non-Michigan companies are included, mainly Indiana, Ohio and New York companies.
